meanings.definition: The position or job of an accountant.
meanings.sent1: Her accountantship at the firm requires attention to detail.
meanings.sent2: He applied for the accountantship at the company after graduating.
meanings.sent3: The accountantship of keeping track of all the expenses became a never-ending task.
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, her accountantship was like a beacon of accuracy.
meanings.sent5: The accountantship of managing the budget was crucial for the success of the project.

meanings.definition: The skill or practice of accounting.
meanings.sent1: Studying accountantship involves learning about financial statements.
meanings.sent2: Her accountantship improved after taking advanced courses in finance.
meanings.sent3: His accountantship was put to the test during tax season.
meanings.sent4: The precision required in accountantship is akin to solving a complex puzzle.
meanings.sent5: Mastering accountantship is essential for a career in finance.
